name: 1942 Mobile
summary: Have you got what it takes to be a WW II fighter ace? 1942 will put your flying skills to the ultimate test! The Second World War: The tank of your airplane is filled up with kerosene and our machine guns are fully-loaded! But be careful: Your opponents are numerous and well armed. Sometimes a few loopings help in order to free yourself from a situation offering no other prospects. As reward after endured attack waves you will receive power ups, which boast your attack and defence capabilities. A classical and well known game that guarantees no boredom.
